name: 蔡偉和
objective: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT 等演算法。
schedule:
第 1-3 週:
1. Analog Signals
a) Convolution
b) Fourier Series Expansion
c) Fourier Transform
d) Laplace Transform
第 3-9 週:
2. Digital Signals
a) Discrete-time Fourier Transform
b) Z-transform
c) Discrete Fourier Series/Transform
第 9 週：期中考
第 10-12 週:
3. Digital Systems
a) Linear Time-invariant Systems
b) Causality/Stability
c) Allpass/Minimum Phase systems
d) Structures for Digital System
第 12-15 週:
4. Sampling Theory
a) A/D & D/A Conversion
b) Sampling Rate Conversion
第 15-17 週:
5. Filter Design
a) Analog Filter
b) IIR Filter
c) FIR Filter
第 18 週：期末考
scorePolicy:
期中考: 40%
期末考: 40%
小考: 10%
參與度: 10%
materials:
Discrete-Time Signal Processing, 3rd Ed.
A. V. Oppenheim, R.
Prentice Hall
